documentation.text: @notice the id of the propsals array that has the most votes
@notice the current status of the vote represented by the WorkflowStatus enum
@notice array of proposals whose id corresponds to the chronological order of addition
@notice map of Voter struct corresponding to the voter addresses

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Voting.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref
struct Voting.Proposal storage ref[] storage ref
function (struct Voting.Proposal storage ref[] storage pointer,struct Voting.Proposal storage ref)

addProposal(string).details: the function can only be called by a registered voterthe function can only be called when the workflow status is ProposalsRegistrationStartedthe proposal description must not be emptythe proposal description must not be too long (< 42000 bytes)the proposal is registered by adding it to the proposalsArray, so it's chronological id is the last index of the arrayemit a ProposalRegistered event

addVoter(address).details: the function can only be called by the ownerthe function can only be called when the workflow status is RegisteringVotersthe voter must not be already registeredthe voter is registered by setting the isRegistered boolean to trueemit a VoterRegistered event

endProposalsRegistering().details: the function can only be called by the ownerthe function can only be called when the workflow status is ProposalsRegistrationStarted

endVotingSession().details: the function can only be called by the ownerthe function can only be called when the workflow status is VotingSessionStarted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setVote(uint256).details: the function can only be called by a registered voterthe function can only be called when the workflow status is VotingSessionStartedthe voter must not have already votedthe proposal id must correspond to a registered proposalthe voter is registered by setting the hasVoted boolean to truethe voter is registered by setting the votedProposalId to the proposal idthe vote count of the proposal is incrementedif the proposal vote count is greater than the current winning proposal vote count, the winning proposal id is set to the proposal id  emit a Voted event

startProposalsRegistering().details: the function can only be called by the ownerthe function can only be called when the workflow status is RegisteringVoters

startVotingSession().details: the function can only be called by the ownerthe function can only be called when the workflow status is ProposalsRegistrationEnded

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

endProposalsRegistering().notice: change the workflow status to ProposalsRegistrationEnded

endVotingSession().notice: change the workflow status to VotingEndedAndTallied

getOneProposal(uint256).notice: get the Proposal struct corresponding to the id

getVoter(address).notice: get the Voter struct corresponding to the address

startProposalsRegistering().notice: change the workflow status to ProposalsRegistrationStarted

startVotingSession().notice: change the workflow status to VotingSessionStarted

winningProposalID().notice: the id of the propsals array that has the most votes

workflowStatus().notice: the current status of the vote represented by the WorkflowStatus enum
